name: Use identical type operator rather than "equal" operator (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all artifacts using "equal" operators instead of type operator.
output:
This report lists all artifacts that use implicit true checking or equal operators rather than identical type operators.

This QR provides the following information:
Artifact full name.
rationale: To compare with type safety,identical type operators should be preffered over implicit true check or equal operators.
remediation: Reduce number of artifacts using true check or equal operators instead of identical type operators.
remediationSample:
<?php
class Test
{
  function testOperator()
  {
    $a = "1";
	if ($a === "1")  //violation removed
	{
	 echo "this is true";
	}
  }
}
$test = new Test();
$test-> testOperator();
?>
